name: example-create-react-app-express
description: Example on using create-react-app with a Node Express Backend

scripts.dev: NODE_ENV='development' concurrently --kill-others-on-fail "npm run server" "npm run client"
scripts.dev:server: cd client && npm run build && cd .. && npm run start
scripts.heroku-postbuild: cd client && npm install && npm install --only=dev --no-shrinkwrap && npm run build
scripts.build: cd client && npm install && hexo generate && cd .. && npm install
